TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示配置文件中的一组相关节。

span.span: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 配置文件 （如 Web.config 文件中） 中的设置划分为部分。Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections. 由于相关的某些部分，它通常是很方便的做法其部分组中。Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group. 类表示`sectionGroup`XML 元素中定义时使用组部分`configSections`配置文件元素。The class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file. 节组可以嵌套 （节组可以包含其他节组以及部分）。Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections). 下面的示例演示`configSections`元素，用于定义三个嵌套的节组：The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ```xml
``` 配置系统加载到的配置文件中的设置对象。The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into objects. 可以使用并属性访问的各节和节组中包含的对象。You can use the and properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a object. 有关如何从配置文件访问信息的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来检索配置设置。The following example shows how to use the class to retrieve configuration settings. 该示例是一个控制台应用程序中读取配置设置和有关每个配置节组和中它的部分向控制台写入信息。The example is a console application that reads configuration settings and writes information about each configuration section group and the sections in it to the console. `Main`方法加载到的配置设置对象，检索从集合对象，然后调用`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法来显示的部分属性值。The `Main` method loads the configuration settings into a object, retrieves the collection from the object, and then calls the `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method to display the section property values. `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法循环访问的节组和调用`ShowSectionGroupInfo`为每个方法。The `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method iterates through the section groups and calls the `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method for each one. `ShowSectionGroupInfo`方法显示的节组、 某些属性值和它所包含的部分名称的名称。The `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method displays the name of the section group, some property values, and the names of the sections that it contains. 如果部分组包含节组，此方法会调用`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`以递归方式显示这些节组。If the section group contains section groups, this method calls `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` recursively to display those section groups. `indentLevel`字段用于将空间添加到左侧和右侧显示的行，以显示逻辑分组。The `indentLevel` field is used to add spaces to the left side of displayed lines to show logical groupings. 所有行都被限制为 79 个字符的文本以避免换行，这会使难以区分的逻辑分组。All lines are limited to 79 characters of text to avoid line wrapping, which would make it harder to distinguish the logical groupings. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

span.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以强制要写入到配置文件，即使它不需要在父文件中已声明，因此对象。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#12)]

Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制这声明，以写入到文件中，如果`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`是`false`，此操作可能会被忽略，如果对象所需的系统。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the object is required by the system. 方法可以强制要写入到配置文件，即使它不需要在父文件中已声明，因此对象。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 此外，它可以删除组从配置文件组是否不需要。Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required. 您可能想要使用方法，以使配置文件可移植性从一台计算机到另一个，而无需担心是否组声明已存在。You might want to use the method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在配置文件中声明的节组属性返回`true`。If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the property returns `true`. 属性返回`false`如果本节继承自 Machine.config 或父配置文件。The property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否的此实例声明。The following code example determines whether this instance of is declared. 这是一个更大示例的概述中提供的部分类。This is part of a larger example provided in the overview for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion(class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion (targetFramework As FrameworkName) As Boolean

abstract member ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName -> bool override this.ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName -> bool

span.span: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

summary.span: 指示在为指定目标版本的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 序列化配置对象层次结构时，是否应序列化当前的 实例。

span.span: Indicates whether the current instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: 如果应序列化当前节组，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 及更高版本创建的每个配置节组必须显式重写此方法并返回 `true`，但仅在此节组对于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的指定版本有效时如此。Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 不必更改已为 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的早期版本创建的现有配置节组。Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基类型包含的默认实现始终返回此方法的`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 换而言之，如果配置节组实施者不重写此方法，默认情况下配置节组将序列的所有 framework 版本。In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
